replies.body:
Hey armoredkoja!


How are you?
You are a really cool player with really great PvPing skills!
And you are very friendly too!
You are an "all-in-one" person!
Anyways, let's keep on topic!
Questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. What is your nationality?
3. How old are you?
4. Are you a male or a female?
5. What would you like to be when you grow up?
6. How tall are you?
7. What are your opinions on me?
8. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
9. Who is your favorite moderator?
10. What is your favorite color?

And I will make a special Bonus question!

Bonus Question. What are your opinions on Avicus?

Thanks for everything!
I hope we can talk via Skype/TeamSpeak soon!
See you in game!

I hope we can talk via Skype/TeamSpeak soon!
See you in game!

replies.body:
Hey Ateh!!

I would just like to start off by saying you are one of the nicest people I know!

1. Kochan
2. Half Japanese, half American.
3. Im 15
4. Male
5. Idk... 
6. 5'6 I think
7. ONE OF THE NICEST PEOPLE EVER
8. Idk
9. Don't like to pick favorites, but Junr is a good friend and he is a great mod.
10. Blue

Bonus Question:
 
 Avicus is one of the best servers out there and has a wonderful community. Avicus is always growing in numbers and in quality and they have a great staff team that is willing to help you with just about anything!
